format:
A data frame with 120 rows representing individual bakers and 24
variables:
description:
Description
Information about each baker and their performance during the series they
appeared on.
title: Bakers
reference:
See
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Great_British_Bake_Off_(series_1)#The_Bakers,
for example, for Series 1 bakers.

parameters.series_runner_up:
An integer. Is 0 if not a runner-up, 1 if a
runner-up.
parameters.technical_median:
An integer denoting the median technical rank
earned by a given baker across all episodes appeared (higher is better).
parameters.percent_technical_top3:
A percentage denoting the number of episodes
in which a given baker placed in the top 3 for the technical challenge, out
of the number of total episodes that the baker appeared in.
parameters.age: An integer denoting age in years at first episode appeared.
parameters.technical_top3:
An integer denoting the number of times a given baker
was in the top 3 (1st, 2nd, or 3rd) on the technical challenge.
parameters.baker_first: A character string giving given name.
parameters.total_episodes_appeared:
An integer denoting the total number of
episodes in which a given baker appeared.
parameters.last_date_us:
A date denoting original airdate of the last episode in
which a given baker appeared (in the US).
parameters.first_date_appeared:
A date denoting original airdate of the first
episode in which a given baker appeared (equivalent to the series premiere
episode in the UK.)
parameters.baker: A character string giving given or nickname.
parameters.star_baker:
An integer denoting the number of times a given baker
won Star Baker.
parameters.technical_highest:
An integer denoting the best technical rank earned
by a given baker across all episodes appeared (higher is better).
parameters.technical_winner:
An integer denoting the number of times a given
baker won first place in the technical challenge.
parameters.technical_bottom:
An integer denoting the number of times a given
baker was in the bottom 3 on the technical challenge.
parameters.baker_full: A character string giving full name.
parameters.baker_last: A character string giving family name.
parameters.last_date_appeared:
A date denoting original airdate of the last
episode in which a given baker appeared (in the UK).
parameters.percent_episodes_appeared:
A percentage denoting the number of
episodes in a given series/season in which a given baker appeared out of
all episodes aired in that series/season.
parameters.series_winner:
An integer. Is 0 if not the series winner, 1 if
series winner.
parameters.first_date_us:
A date denoting original airdate of the first episode
in which a given baker appeared (equivalent to the series premiere episode
in the US).
parameters.technical_lowest:
An integer denoting the worst technical rank earned
by a given baker across all episodes appeared (higher is better).
